page.title: 19FAMILY LIFE 11
page.content: {A day in the life of a ten year old {child.} {7.00am}awoke, washed, dressed, and had breakfast.Set off for school. {8.45am}arrived at school, played. {9.00am}School.After assembly, we did some Maths, then S.R.A. work (English). {12.00am}we finish morning school, choose our lunch from the menu and eat it.Playtime. {1.00pm}we had to go by car to-day to the area sports at Shipston.Shipston, Brailles, Ettington, Treddington and Ilmington took part. {3.30pm}we got back to School in time to go home. {3.45pm}arrived home.Took my dogs for a walk.Rode to Compton Scorpion and back on one of my ponies.{6.15pm}had tea. {9.30pm}I went to bed.
